item.title: Get lifetime access to Rosetta Stone for 52% off and learn a new language
item.description: Get lifetime access to Rosetta Stone's full 25-language library for just $151.99 with coupon code SAVENOW and start your journey to fluency.

item.title: Bridge past and present with this digital film scanner on sale from Kodak
item.description: Effortlessly digitize your old film negatives and slides with the Kodak Slide N Scan, preserving your family's cherished memories for future generations.

item.title: Get a refurbished MacBook Air for 63% off
item.description: Choose sustainability and save money with a refurbished 2017 MacBook Air, available for just $359.97 through August 4.

item.title: Block annoying ads for life with AdGuard for only $19
item.description: Safeguard your family's online experience with AdGuard's lifetime subscription, offering top-tier ad blocking and malware protection.
